title: HELP ME PLEASE! 'Connection Timeout: The request to the PvP.net server timed out'
body:
Guys! Please I need help. I know this issue comes up so much, but I just can't fix it, even with the thousands of solutions out there. 
To explain it further,
I will launch the game and log-on just fine. But then after about 30 seconds of being in the actual game, this message makes itself noticable: 
http://forums.euw.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=120186
What can I do to solve this?!

replies.body:
This is caused by your client be unable to maintain a stable connection to our servers. I suggest you check out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should resolve this.

Let me know if this helped.
